# Stakeholder Register

## ISO 21502:2020 Stakeholder Management

### 1. Stakeholder Identification

| ID  | Stakeholder             | Type     | Role           | Contact               |
| --- | ----------------------- | -------- | -------------- | --------------------- |
| S01 | Project Owner           | Internal | Decision Maker | @ascender1729         |
| S02 | Core Contributors       | Internal | Developers     | GitHub contributors   |
| S03 | Community Contributors  | External | Developers     | Open source community |
| S04 | End Users               | External | Consumers      | GitHub users          |
| S05 | GitHub Sponsors         | External | Funders        | Sponsor portal        |
| S06 | VibeTensor Organization | Internal | Parent org     | @VibeTensor           |

---

### 2. Stakeholder Analysis Matrix

#### Power/Interest Grid

```
                    INTEREST
                 Low         High
           +----------+----------+
    High   |  Keep    |  Manage  |
           | Satisfied|  Closely |
 POWER     +----------+----------+
    Low    |  Monitor |   Keep   |
           |          | Informed |
           +----------+----------+
```

| Stakeholder            | Power  | Interest | Strategy       |
| ---------------------- | ------ | -------- | -------------- |
| Project Owner          | High   | High     | Manage Closely |
| Core Contributors      | Medium | High     | Keep Informed  |
| Community Contributors | Low    | High     | Keep Informed  |
| End Users              | Low    | Medium   | Monitor        |
| GitHub Sponsors        | High   | Medium   | Keep Satisfied |
| VibeTensor Org         | High   | Medium   | Keep Satisfied |

---

### 3. Detailed Stakeholder Profiles

#### S01: Project Owner

| Attribute            | Details                                    |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| **Name**             | Pavan Kumar                                |
| **GitHub**           | @ascender1729                              |
| **Role**             | Founder, Lead Maintainer                   |
| **Expectations**     | Project success, community growth, quality |
| **Concerns**         | Technical debt, sustainability, adoption   |
| **Communication**    | Direct, daily involvement                  |
| **Engagement Level** | Very High                                  |

#### S02: Core Contributors

| Attribute            | Details                                    |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| **Definition**       | Regular contributors with merge rights     |
| **Expectations**     | Clear contribution guidelines, recognition |
| **Concerns**         | Code quality, documentation, mentorship    |
| **Communication**    | GitHub Issues, PRs, Discussions            |
| **Engagement Level** | High                                       |

#### S03: Community Contributors

| Attribute            | Details                               |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| **Definition**       | Occasional contributors, first-timers |
| **Expectations**     | Good first issues, helpful reviews    |
| **Concerns**         | Onboarding complexity, response time  |
| **Communication**    | Issues, CONTRIBUTING.md               |
| **Engagement Level** | Medium                                |

#### S04: End Users

| Attribute            | Details                             |
| -------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| **Definition**       | Developers using IssueVista          |
| **Expectations**     | Working product, good documentation |
| **Concerns**         | Bugs, missing features, UX          |
| **Communication**    | README, Releases, Changelog         |
| **Engagement Level** | Low-Medium                          |

#### S05: GitHub Sponsors

| Attribute            | Details                             |
| -------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| **Definition**       | Financial supporters                |
| **Expectations**     | Project progress, transparency, ROI |
| **Concerns**         | Project viability, fund usage       |
| **Communication**    | Sponsor updates, monthly reports    |
| **Engagement Level** | Medium                              |

#### S06: VibeTensor Organization

| Attribute            | Details                              |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| **Definition**       | Parent GitHub organization           |
| **Expectations**     | Alignment with org goals, reputation |
| **Concerns**         | Brand consistency, quality           |
| **Communication**    | Org-level coordination               |
| **Engagement Level** | Medium                               |

---

### 4. Engagement Plan

| Stakeholder            | Engagement Strategy          | Frequency   | Owner         |
| ---------------------- | ---------------------------- | ----------- | ------------- |
| Project Owner          | Direct involvement           | Daily       | -             |
| Core Contributors      | Sprint planning, reviews     | Weekly      | Project Owner |
| Community Contributors | Good first issues, mentoring | Ongoing     | Maintainers   |
| End Users              | Release notes, documentation | Per release | Maintainers   |
| GitHub Sponsors        | Progress reports             | Monthly     | Project Owner |
| VibeTensor Org         | Alignment meetings           | Quarterly   | Project Owner |

---

### 5. Communication Preferences

| Stakeholder            | Preferred Channel | Format             | Timing          |
| ---------------------- | ----------------- | ------------------ | --------------- |
| Project Owner          | Direct            | Any                | Real-time       |
| Core Contributors      | GitHub            | Technical          | 24-48h response |
| Community Contributors | GitHub Issues     | Friendly, detailed | 48-72h response |
| End Users              | README/Releases   | Clear, concise     | Per release     |
| GitHub Sponsors        | Email/Portal      | Professional       | Monthly         |
| VibeTensor Org         | Internal          | Summary            | Quarterly       |

---

### 6. Stakeholder Expectations

| Stakeholder            | Key Expectations        | Success Metrics               |
| ---------------------- | ----------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| Project Owner          | Quality, adoption       | Stars, forks, users           |
| Core Contributors      | Meaningful work         | PRs merged, features shipped  |
| Community Contributors | Learning, recognition   | First PR merged, mentioned    |
| End Users              | Working tool            | Issues resolved, satisfaction |
| GitHub Sponsors        | Value delivery          | Features completed, updates   |
| VibeTensor Org         | Positive representation | No incidents, growth          |

---

### 7. Conflict Resolution

| Conflict Type          | Resolution Path    | Escalation             |
| ---------------------- | ------------------ | ---------------------- |
| Technical disagreement | Discussion, voting | Tech Lead decision     |
| Priority conflict      | Impact analysis    | Project Owner decision |
| Resource conflict      | Capacity review    | Project Owner decision |
| Community conflict     | Code of Conduct    | Project Owner action   |

---

### 8. Stakeholder Feedback Loop

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                    FEEDBACK CYCLE                        │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│  Collect     →    Analyze    →    Action    →   Report  │
│  (Issues,         (Trends,        (Changes,     (Updates,│
│   Surveys)        Priorities)     Fixes)        Reports) │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

---

### 9. Review Schedule

| Review Type                  | Frequency            | Participants  |
| ---------------------------- | -------------------- | ------------- |
| Stakeholder needs assessment | Quarterly            | Project Owner |
| Engagement effectiveness     | Monthly              | Maintainers   |
| Communication review         | Sprint retrospective | All           |

---

_Last Updated: December 26, 2025_
_Compliant with: ISO 21502:2020 Section 6.2_
